message.body: Good morning. Would you like to do a yoga class tonight?
What time does it start?
6:15 in cc
I'm not leaving school until at least seven. Nate is making dinner if you want to come over after yoga
Cool. I'll let you know.
I just went off on coconut.
Whoa, what happened?
He's broke. Not looking for work. Depressed. Drinking too much. Relying in his pArents. He is so privileged. I just can't stand it sometimes.
He is kind of a cliche. What a guy.
All he said when I told him about my job is "want to get me one?"
Ugh, he's like a sloth.
He doesn't do anything useful.
I hate to say it, but he souls volunteer
Should
That's what I said. He mentioned his mom so much. Ugh.
What about his mom?
About working at her office, staying with her, stuff she bought him...
He's in love with her
Ugh. I can't stand him sometimes.
Are u feeling up for dinner?
I don't think so. I'm in a bad mood after the coconut thing and have a book to read. Thanks for the offer. :)
I'm sorry about the coconut stress. Enjoy your cozy evening!
ï¿¼Interested? 9.5
Are they leather?
Yes.
I like them will you hold them for me to try on?
Sure!
I have a meeting at school tomorrow at 8pm, would you still like to go out tmrw night?
Yes but do you want to play to by ear?
Sure, keep me posted on how you are feeling
I mean for you- you might be tied up with school?
I would love to go out tonight if you still can.
I would like that. The equestrian meeting shouldn't be longer than an hour, so I will be in philly by 9:30. Do you want to go out, or should I come over? Is Pete up for anything?
Board games would be fun
I'll text Pete. I have a feeling he is going to flake...will be in touch.
Ok!
9:30 is too late for Pete. Would you like to come watch a movie?
I had a rough day at the county assistance office, I'm feeling teary.
What happened?
They cancelled Ella's insurance like a month ago and I've gone in four times trying to get it reinstated. Each time takes about four hours of sitting in the waiting room. Today I cried in the office
I'm so sorry. Why was it cancelled?
Because I don't have income to show.
Do you hAve any legal recourse? Legal aid? Help from school?
The city offers legal aid but there is a waiting list and another city building with lengthy waits and full voicemail boxes. Women's legal group has a waiting list.
They approved Ella's insurance once I started crying.
I'm hating philly more than ever. Feeling so criminalized for going to school and needing insurance for my kid
I'm so sorry.
How are you today?
I'm feeling ok. Moving on. I hate when I feel like this is just my life "right now" when really it's just my life
Hey I'm making brunch for some of my nice coworkers at cantina. Michelle might come. You and Ella are invited. Sunday at noon.
